participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Evelyn enjoys solitude and cherishes deep connections with her interests.
participant_1.background: I value my collection of Celtics memorabilia. I love to read fantasy novels and poetry. I prefer to eat alone at a quiet restaurant, where I can enjoy my meal and my thoughts. I love celebrating Diwali with my family. I like vintage furniture.

participant_2.name: Marco
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, Marco seeks to make a positive impact on the world, especially in animal welfare, while balancing his professional and personal life.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of my dedication to animal welfare and my ability to make the world a better place for animals. I work as an accountant. I don't feel like I can be myself around my boss because we're dating. I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor. My master's degree is in Italian literature.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook and garden and read and I have a masters degree in Italian literature.
That's cool. I also like to read, I like fantasy novels and poetry.
I like a lot of different kinds of books. What's your favorite fantasy novel?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really like the Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan.
I've heard of that, but I haven't read it yet. I'll have to check it out. What do you like about it?
I like the characters and the world building. It's really immersive.
I'm always looking for new books to read. I'll put that one on my list.
You'll like it. Have you heard of the Stormlight Archive series by Brandon Sanderson?
I have! I've heard really good things about it.
It's also really good. It's a little slow to start, but it picks up and gets really good.
I'll check it out. I'm always looking for new books to read
